abstract: In their last letter to shareholders, Ian M. Cumming and Joseph S. Steinberg, the founders of the Leucadia National Corporation, offer some insight, a little humor and fond remembrances.
snippet: In their last letter to shareholders, Ian M. Cumming and Joseph S. Steinberg, the founders of the Leucadia National Corporation, offer some insight, a little humor and fond remembrances.
lead_paragraph: It would be a stretch to classify the letter to shareholders as a literary genre. But for some companies, like Berkshire Hathaway or the Leucadia National Corporation, these annual dispatches are eagerly consumed not only by shareholders but also by interested observers.

headline.main: From Leucadia, a Final Letter to Shareholders
